        public Reader​(java.io.File fichier)
       throws java.io.IOException,
              WrongFileFormatException
        Try to read a PLY file,
        Parameters:
        fichier - : A regular file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the bufferedReader reader encounters a problem to read a line
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified file does not exist
        WrongFileFormatException - if the specified file isn't a .ply file

      • headerCheck

        public boolean headerCheck()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Prerequisite for propertySearch function. Reads the header of the associate PLY file and try to get : author nbPoints nbFaces
        Returns:
        true If the header of the ply file contains a correct number of :
      • nbPoints (vertex)
      • nbFaces (face)
        • else returns false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        propertySearch()
